net.parim.sns.common.utils

类 Threads

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.parim.sns.common.utils.Threads

  • public class Threads
extends java.lang.Object
    线程相关工具类.
    版本:
    2013-01-15
    作者:
    calvin

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void gracefulShutdown(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService pool, int shutdownTimeout, int shutdownNowTimeout, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
      按照ExecutorService JavaDoc示例代码编写的Graceful Shutdown方法.
      static void normalShutdown(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService pool, int timeout, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
      直接调用shutdownNow的方法, 有timeout控制.取消在workQueue中Pending的任务,并中断所有阻塞函数.
      static void sleep(long millis)
      sleep等待,单位为毫秒,忽略InterruptedException.
      static void sleep(long duration, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
      sleep等待,忽略InterruptedException.

    • 方法详细资料

      • sleep

        public static void sleep(long millis)
        sleep等待,单位为毫秒,忽略InterruptedException.

      • sleep

        public static void sleep(long duration,
         java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
        sleep等待,忽略InterruptedException.

      • gracefulShutdown

        public static void gracefulShutdown(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService pool,
                    int shutdownTimeout,
                    int shutdownNowTimeout,
                    java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        按照ExecutorService JavaDoc示例代码编写的Graceful Shutdown方法. 先使用shutdown, 停止接收新任务并尝试完成所有已存在任务. 如果超时, 则调用shutdownNow, 取消在workQueue中Pending的任务,并中断所有阻塞函数. 如果仍人超時，則強制退出. 另对在shutdown时线程本身被调用中断做了处理.

      • normalShutdown

        public static void normalShutdown(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService pool,
                  int timeout,
                  java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        直接调用shutdownNow的方法, 有timeout控制.取消在workQueue中Pending的任务,并中断所有阻塞函数.
